resources.string: Please turn on Wi-Fi of your tablet and make sure the Wi-Fi has been connected successfully with your Tablet.
The dock phone battery has been removed already if there is no dock phone battery included in your Telpad.
Sticker on box: No battery will be included with your Telpad dock. The Telpad will operate via a plugged power adapter.

How to remove battery from dock phone? 
 1.Dry your hands firstly. 
 2.Undock tablet from dock phone,unplug adaptor and 
 phone line. 
 3.Open the battery cover at the bottom of dock phone. 
 4.Remove the dock phone battery from the battery case. 
 5.Install the battery cover,plug adaptor and phone line,and then dock tablet on the dock phone. Telpad will return to nomal use.

How to proper dispose of the removed battery? 
 1.Dispose of batteries in accordance with local, state and 
 federal laws and regulations. 
 2.Do not put batteries into your regular or bulk trash 
 collection. 
 3.Do not put batteries in fire as they may explode. 
 4.Do not allow children or pets to bite or suck the battery. 
 5.Do not smash or pierce the battery,or expose it to high 
 external pressure.
Please remove the dock phone battery of your Telpad.The Telpad will operate via a plugged power adapter.
